mapper.select: select * from note where 1 = 1 and ${condition} and noteId = #{noteId} and content = '#{content}' and noteTypeId = #{noteTypeId} and createDate = '#{createDate}' and bgUserId = #{bgUserId} limit #{startPage},#{page}

select count(noteId) from note where 1 = 1 and ${condition} and noteId = #{noteId} and content = '#{content}' and noteTypeId = #{noteTypeId} and createDate = '#{createDate}' and bgUserId = #{bgUserId}
mapper.update: update note set noteId = #{noteId},content = #{content},noteTypeId = #{noteTypeId},createDate = #{createDate},bgUserId = #{bgUserId},noteId = #{noteId} where noteId = #{noteId}
mapper.delete: delete from note where noteId in (#{ids})
mapper.select: select year(createDate) as yearDate,count(*) as count from note where bgUserId = #{bgUserId} group by yearDate desc
select month(createDate) as monthDate,count(*) as count from note where bgUserId = #{bgUserId} and ${condition} group by monthDate asc
select day(createDate) as dayDate,count(*) as count from note where bgUserId = #{bgUserId} and ${condition} group by dayDate asc
